TextView.android:text:
This feature is current under testing.
 This means that this feature will work under suitable conditions or might not work at all!
 Feature is currently tested on Apollo and Play Music.
 Also, name of the track saved in your storage must match with the existing data on this app.

 Instructions

 After pressing on the search button below, you need to press on the PLAY button next to Search bar in the next screen.
 If it doesn't work, don't panic!. You can give it a try again. 
Simple as that.

Remember, DO NOT DIRECTLY GO AND PRESS ON THE PLAY BUTTON in next screen. First open this screen only then go to the one!
 If you do, (Patrick, this is for you) the app will crash, idk why :/
 Also, you must have a song running in background to use this feature!
